mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComReqst Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ COM_REQST_SN , REQST_SJ , APPLCNT_NM , APPLCNT_TEL_NATION_NO , APPLCNT_TEL_AREA_NO , APPLCNT_TEL_TLOF_NO , APPLCNT_TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , APPLCNT_EMAIL , COM_NM , BMAN_REG_NO , RPRSTIV_NM , BRND_NM , CTGRY_DSCR , BRND_DSCR , LEGACY_DISTB_CHNNL_DSCR , MEMO_CONT , COM_REQST_PRCS_STAT_CD , PRCS_COMPT_DT , PRCS_COMPT_ADMIN_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_REQST WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_REQST_SN = #{comReqstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteComReqst Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM COM_REQST WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_REQST_SN = #{comReqstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
